title: Teacher Emotion Recognition and Utilization Strategies for Virtual Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners are science teachers with diverse educational backgrounds, participating asynchronously via LMS in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more linguistic/non-linguistic indicators for interpreting emotional states in virtual learning environments
Learners can propose two emotion-regulation strategies using ICT tools in a format applicable to actual lesson design
Learners can write a project report analyzing differences in emotional awareness among teachers using interpretive comparative research methodology
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
